name: GoOffers.net
tag_list: affiliate, network, affiliate-network, internet-advertising, advertising, offers, affiliate-offers, affiliate-programs, best-affiliate-offers, best-affiliate-programs, top-affiliate-offers, top-affiliate-programs, super-affiliate, super-affiliates
overview:
GoOffers is a leading CPA (Cost Per action) affiliate network that specializes in running various different affiliate offers, including mobile, finance, health, free trials, email submits, etc…

They have a proven track record of generating 1000’s of quality leads for their Advertisers every single day. Affiliates enjoy top payouts on some of the highest converting campaigns in the industry, along with weekly, biweekly or monthly payments. They have dedicated account managers on hand 24 hours a day to ensure that you have the tools necessary to meet and exceed your goals.
